name: wallos
description: Wallos is a self-hosted subscription management app that tracks recurring expenses. It shows cost breakdowns, renewal dates, and categories in a clean, mobile-friendly interface.

features.title: Subscription Tracking
features.description: Monitor all recurring expenses including streaming services, software licenses, and memberships in one place

features.title: Cost Breakdown
features.description: View total monthly, yearly, and lifetime costs with automatic calculations and currency conversion

features.title: Renewal Reminders
features.description: Get notified before subscriptions renew to decide whether to continue or cancel services

features.title: Category Organization
features.description: Group subscriptions by type such as entertainment, productivity, or utilities for better oversight

features.title: Single Sign-On
features.description: Associate subscriptions with specific credit cards or payment methods to manage billing

features.title: Price History
features.description: Track subscription price changes over time to identify cost increases and optimize spending

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Visualize subscription costs with charts and graphs showing spending patterns and trends

features.title: Multi
features.description: Handle subscriptions in different currencies with automatic conversion to your base currency
